newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends higher vs dlr at 1,076.80.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends higher vs dlr at 1,076.80.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed 2.8 pesos higher against the dollar at 1,076.80 in speculative trading on the country's interbank market, dealers said on Friday.

They said the peso was buoyed, at least in part, by persistent market rumors that a local cellular telephone company was preparing to sell a large amount of dollars but the rumors apparently turned out to be baseless.
Dealers reported 368 trades for a total of $167 million and said the peso traded in a narrow range of 1,078.25 to 1,075 range.
